activities: A number of user communities are served through www.rockyou.com and through our offline interactions with customers, and we collect business-related information for the general purposes outlined below. Activities vary according to the product or service involved, but the vast majority of information that RockYou transfers is user contact information and information related to the user's game history, settings, and preferences. Information may be used for a variety of purposes including customer service, software download, product support, website content selection, website performance management and navigation, and marketing and training. As part of RockYou's services, some customers may also allow us to maintain or provide us with access to data. In connection with those services, RockYou does not control the data and any access to or use of such data is incidental to completing its contractual requirements for the customer. RockYou  will also transfer information concerning current and former employees, consultants, contractors and job applicants to the United States for processing and storage. RockYou collects, transfers, and uses this data for purposes of employee benefits, workforce management and provision of products and services. This includes evaluation of qualifications for employment, provision of employment benefits, reporting, security management, administration of compensation, performance management and training, workforce management, budgeting and salary administration, business contact directory, company network access, authentication and personalization. And RockYou may transfer information concerning employees, customers, prospects, partners and suppliers of companies engaged with RockYou in acquisition activity. This information may be used for evaluation and integration of acquired companies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data and human resources data
